TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsOneOf extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示替代字或片語清單，其中任何一項都可以用來比對語音輸入。

span.span: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件包含一份替代的單字或片語，講話時，可能無法辨識其中任何一個。A object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken. 您可以建立從陣列的替代項目清單物件或陣列的物件。You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of objects or arrays of objects. 使用屬性來存取清單中的替代項目。Use the property to access the alternative items in the list. 類別代表`one-of`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 中的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。The class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 如需 SRGS`one-of`項目，以及透過 System.Speech，其支援詳細資料請參閱[一個-項目的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801)。For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建構的執行個體陣列類別物件，從陣列物件，或為空白清單。You can construct an instance of the class from an array of objects, from an array of objects, or as an empty list. 使用物件而不是替代項目清單中的物件可讓您套用屬性給每個項目在清單中，例如， ， ，和。Using objects instead of objects in a list of alternatives lets you apply properties of to each item in the list, such as , , , and .

summary.span: 取得 項目中所包含的所有替代項目清單。

span.span: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替代的單字和片語，這個屬性所傳回可能已新增至為或物件。The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the as or objects.
